A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I found the action and humour to be once again fantadtic. My only issue was it seems the new director has purposely sabotaged in Abrams plans. How smoke was dealt with left me feeling annoyed that after all this wait I learned nothing about him. The fight scene I  smoked throne room was fast paced and exciting although I question how ray got so good with a saber since luke only gave her 3 jedi lessons. But over all a great film.
